content:
Trackers to discuss on this week's Wednesdays at 12pm Eastern Da Vinci Notifications call:

Jira Issue Summary (Reporter) Proposed Resolution

  1. J#26182 Question: Out Of Scope: What is a trigger (ginocanessa) Considered - Question answered
  2. J#26175 Reliable Delivery heading does not discuss the topic. (ginocanessa) Persuasive with Modification
  3. J#26161 fix the summaries or remove since not commplete (ehaas)
  4. J#26159 clarify must support rules1 (emmanurse)
  5. J#26138 What's the author field good for? (Isaac.Vetter) Not Persuasive with Modification
  6. J#26130 Shoud not have two ways of doing something. (celine_lefebvre) Not Persuasive with Modification
  7. J#26119 Multiple ways to create a message is not ideal (celine_lefebvre) Persuasive with Modification
  8. J#26117 Contract agreement to establish triggering event (celine_lefebvre) Persuasive
  9. J#26116 Many things create encounters from Admission Discharge Scenarios (celine_lefebvre) Persuasive with Modification
  10. J#26098 Why Messaging? (vassil) Not Persuasive
I apologize for not seeing this in time. Is it possible for me to give some more background to FHIR#26098 next week?

yes ... but if your goal is for us to remove messaging from the guide which currently what the guide is 90% + about we are not going to do that for this version... I think there is a golden opportunity in the future to include R4 backported Subscriptions and provide a bridge to R5 subscriptions.
No, my goal is to provide more background on my vote to inform future versions. Thanks, I have next week's meeting on my calendar.

Trackers to discuss on this week's Wednesdays at 12pm Eastern Da Vinci Notifications call:

Also Discuss adding the transfer use case
